name: Tap to Fill Lite
description:
Addictive puzzle game filled with colorful fun!!
Tap to Fill... fill to WIN!!!!
This version also contains GUIDE that will help with the first 30 stages.

★ Easy to play, difficult to master
Tap to fill in panels with color on each stage. Any neighboring panels will also be colored in with each tap. Tap again to remove color from a panel and its neighbors. Fill in every stage panel with color to clear the stage!

★ Can’t figure it out? Use the GUIDE!
When you are stuck, you can get help through the GUIDE. The GUIDE is always useful for the most difficult stages.

★ 100 challenging stages… and more!
Everyone begins with 100 stages in this free version. Can you clear them all?

Available in English, German, French, Spanish, Chinese, Vietnamese, Japanese.
